title: So, I was just permantly banned. I'm pretty upset.
body:
Edit: permanently*

After my previous fourteen day ban, I played cautiously. I stopped speaking as much as possible unless I was spoken to and I think it worked for a while. I’m sure I was still reported for things, such as feeding or negativity. I know I was negative, but it was mainly stating the obvious. Games with a leaver or someone intentionally feeding. I know it would have been wise but sometimes I just can’t help but say ‘GG’ after a mistake or something tilting.

I said ages ago that this was going to be my last account and I’ll probably honour that. I understand that many Rioters may be cheering and I’d probably be cheering as well. It’s not a secret that I’m a toxic player, but I can’t help it that I speak my mind. I did ask for a permanent chat restriction as I’m vastly less toxic when I have to limit what I say. I have attempted to turn off /all or mute people, but I get severe anxiety about it – I have brought this up with Rioters and they did nothing.

No one has actually explained how I’m being toxic. Riot’s never been like, “Woah, hey, you need to stop being negative!” it’s just an automated chat restriction and then they move on.

I don’t have much else to say. I’m just going to paste the logs and see how that goes. (I’m fixing the spelling in them, that’s the only editing – anything in brackets is my thoughts (saves space).

Game 1
Third Reich: Normal needs draft
Third Reich: So I don’t have to see Yasuo every game
Third Reich: Wtf
Third Reich: Yes you do
Third Reich: It has an awful laugh
Third Reich: not annoying enough
Third Reich: however dark lux is super kawaii
Third Reich: why they haven’t nerfed Yasuo is beyond me
Third Reich: Skilless piece of trash champ rofl (I can see how this, of all things, may be toxic or negative. I was stating my opinion.)
Third Reich: you hit me twice and did 50% of my hp.
Third Reich: that’s not being outplayed
Third Reich: yes he does
Third Reich: having mr 7 and playing him in norms
Third Reich: smh
Third Reich: W/e games done anyway (Diana was AFK. Mid turret was gone, and I was down 50 cs.)
Third Reich: Diana has dialup
Third Reich: No one is salty
Third Reich: r0fl
Third Reich: Yasuo is easy
Third Reich: nothing about him is hard to do.
Third Reich: No.
Third Reich: I don't own lee or zed either
Third Reich: Brainless no skill champs
Third Reich: mfw I just want mr 7
Third Reich: I never said lux took skill
Third Reich: I said that Yasuo takes none
Third Reich: also, why would I care about a rank on a server where master is plat NA?
Third Reich: Seeing as I'm not, nor have I ever been, bronze, irrelevant.
Third Reich: I said she was afk at 3m
Third Reich: no one else is lagging
Third Reich: it’s your internet
Third Reich: Although, do inform me of how a half-lane wide spell that blocks all projectiles is balanced
Third Reich: and that’s how I know I'm right
Third Reich: Yasuo is the lane version of master yi
Third Reich: I'm not salty. I'm bored
Third Reich: Yasuo ruins every game he's in.
Third Reich: and reported
Third Reich: enjoy your chat restriction.
Third Reich: gf your silver account (unneeded, I agree.)
Third Reich: r0fl
Third Reich: rip halobomb
Third Reich: 5/7 name
Third Reich: and this thresh watches whatshisface
Third Reich: No.
Third Reich: No point being in a lane where I'm hard countered with zero counter play
Third Reich: idk the guy who hangs out with maxmoefoe
Third Reich: I went from diamond 4 mmr to g5
Third Reich: I had a 90% winrate
Third Reich: don’t talk
Third Reich: I can’t carry Australian players (unneeded, but true. I struggle to carry game son this server where I had no issue on NA)
Third Reich: I have an unbeatable Annie
Third Reich: put Annie Bot in the dirt
Third Reich: don’t talk to me or my son again
Third Reich: go on na
Third Reich: I'll 1v1 you there
Third Reich: ofc I lost to a yasuo
Third Reich: Getting 4 shot at level 3 is balanced
Third Reich: nah
Third Reich: just ban it and never have to worry in ranked
Third Reich: yes
Third Reich: lets poke yasuo’s resourceless 15s wall
Third Reich: that blocks every ability of mine
Third Reich: worth
Third Reich: oh
Third Reich: yeah, I should poke with my ult
Third Reich: games over anyway (Yasuo was now 2 shotting half our team)
Third Reich: boosted in a normal game
Third Reich: also 84cs caitlyn talking trash (An addon to above. I did badly so I was boosted)
Third Reich: Lol
Third Reich: Asking for reports is considered witch-hunting
Third Reich: and is a reportable offense
Third Reich: yeah, happens with no ganks
Third Reich: No one is being toxic but your naut
Third Reich: witch-hunting
Third Reich: gg
Third Reich: who is that?
Third Reich: rofl
Third Reich: I'd be phased if I did anything wrong
Third Reich: so, what did I do to be reported?
Third Reich: or are you doing it because you're upset?
Third Reich: No one was toxic
Third Reich: I'm trying to figure out what I did that was report worthy (I still have no idea)
Third Reich: rofl
Third Reich: I'm playing one-handed.
Third Reich: also, thank you for all the ganks.
Third Reich: I was giving you the reason why I was doing badly
Third Reich: you have more deaths than me
Third Reich: and I get 2 shot by half their team
Third Reich: There's nothing lux can do against a Yasuo.
Third Reich: There's a reason why you don't pick Lux into him.
Third Reich: I actually sold it when he dived me at the fountain, but whatever
Third Reich: you're*
Third Reich: after you

I have so many more things that I could add. I have, however, said it all before. I'm going to make a support ticket, not that I'll be unbanned.

I'm actually furious that I wasted another $700 on this account, especially now that income is tough and I have nothing to show for it.

I should have known that guy begging everyone to report me would actually work.

replies.body:
I'm not going to sugarcoat this, I'm going to tell you straight up. Hopefully you will at least understand why this happened.

What Barry said pretty much hit the nail on the head. Was this one game that bad? Sure maybe not, but you were creating a consistent negative atmosphere right from the start of the game, and that's just with your chat. You had clearly given up on winning, and more than likely that was affecting your play to some degree as well (whether negative or otherwise). Given your history of negativity that is more than enough to net you a punishment.

This is not your first punishment. You have proven through at least two chat restrictions and a 14 day ban that you weren't going to improve your behaviour, and if I remember the timeline correctly from when you started posting on boards, all of this has been in a relatively short timeframe. I also seem to recall you mentioning that this is your second account at some point, which likely means you have been perma banned before as well.

You were on thin ice, and you stepped too heavily. If you really couldn't find another outlet you could have taken off and taped up your enter key or something so you couldn't type. Where there is a will there is a way.

You are still free to create a new account, but if you don't take this seriously, and take steps to manage your behaviour (regardless of the cause of it) to prevent it from negatively impacting others, then any new account you make is going to face the same end.

You have proven through at least two chat restrictions and a 14 day ban that you weren't going to improve your behaviour, and if I remember the timeline correctly from when you started posting on boards, all of this has been in a relatively short timeframe. I also seem to recall you mentioning that this is your second account at some point, which likely means you have been perma banned before as well.

> 
> You are still free to create a new account, but if you don't take this seriously, and take steps to manage your behaviour (regardless of the cause of it) to prevent it from negatively impacting others, then any new account you make is going to face the same end.

I have about 42 perm banned accounts.
Rofl

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2016-12-07T03:36:54.849+0000)
>
> Rofl

Shocking how bias Riot is.

I mean, you've been banned before, this was your last warning, thin ice, zero tolerance. And you pointed out spots yourself which were rude or "toxic".

Don't think about "how can i get perma'd for this". Its not for this. Its for literally EVERYTHING you've done leading up to this.

Its the straw that broke the camels back friend.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-06T09:21:19.046+0000)
>
> I mean, you've been banned before, this was your last warning, thin ice, zero tolerance. And you pointed out spots yourself which were rude or "toxic".
> 
> Don't think about "how can i get perma'd for this". Its not for this. Its for literally EVERYTHING you've done leading up to this.
> 
> Its the straw that broke the camels back friend.

Hm. But my issue is how is this game worthy of a punishment? It was only this game. This is probably the only game I've been reported in. There's no way this ban was manual either, as it was instant after the match.

I mean, I feel like a man in a room full of feminists. I can't even breath correctly.

I've played with you before, and from what i've seen you're not a very good player ( No offence ) Although i don't remember you being this Toxic. Lux against Yasuo is such an easy lane and Yasuo has a lot of counterplay, ofc i wouldn't expect someone form NA to have the braincells to know that but sure, Calling Zed and Lee a "Brainless" Champ is so out of the question as i've seen 0 games of yours with either of them. In Fact you have below 50% win rate in an Elo you claim to be above which is kinda depressing people would believe you being a "Diamond 90%" win rate. Blamming the enemy champ for your own mistakes is a low blow especially since you're "Diamond" and you should know better, there are a lot of things that Lux can do against Yasuo and for 1 in involves skill in which i presume you do not have based on this Text. Yasuo has been nerfed and thats all he's been getting, tell me the last time he got buffed, what last year? Yasuo's Windwall is on a 23 - 18 sec cd lv 1 - 5 and only last for 4 sec so the fact that you think that is OP shows how "Diamond" you are. And no you're not bored, you're 100% salty. Reading further i can see you have trouble poking Yasuo which is Ironic seeing that Lux has one of the best pokes in game next to Xerath and Varus. Did you know that Yasuo has a 48% Win rate currently across all Elos? You just think he is OP cause you 1. don't know how to verse him 2. Afraid that if you do beat him, your team mates will just feed him, and not because he is actually OP. It's funny how you're talking about getting someone banned but here you are getting banned, a bit Ironic on your part but ok. You bitched and whine the whole game and on multiple occasions called players no-skill/brainless and basically just slammed the whole of OCE calling them inferior. Now i get how this is a joke like "EU LUL" but i hardly think you're joking when you say that, and if you say Masters on OCE is Plat on NA and you're Gold on OCE, does that mean you're Bronze in NA? Also, Junglers DON'T need to gank, for anyone, there is nothing that says Junglers are obliged to gank for laners so i don't know what you're complaining about. For a "Diamond" player you sure talk a lot, let me remind you, you are in a team that you have no idea of and you're trying to reason with them on why you're feeding? DO you think they care? They don't know you, you don't know them, why bother trying to reason with them, at the end of the day, they will forget about you, and you will forget about them, you're not bonded, you're not friends, who cares? They don't care if you're feeding and you shouldn't either, everyone has bad games but the fact that you chose to make this bad game even worse by trying to prove yourself therfore making yourself more stupid. Toxicity is a choice, and you chose it, it's not about the words you use, it's about how and when you use it. The worst part is you spent $700, trying to prove yourself to people you don't know and never will know for what? To get a little satisfaction? To show that you're not a feeder? You need to understand that people have bad games, and you are no exception. Trying to prove yourself is not the way to go. You just spent $700 trying to prove yourself, is it worth it?

> [{quoted}](name=Wast3land ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-12-07T02:34:18.951+0000)

Afraid that if you do beat him, your team mates will just feed him, and not because he is actually OP. It's funny how you're talking about getting someone banned but here you are getting banned, a bit Ironic on your part but ok. You bitched and whine the whole game and on multiple occasions called players no-skill/brainless and basically just slammed the whole of OCE calling them inferior. Now i get how this is a joke like "EU LUL" but i hardly think you're joking when you say that, and if you say Masters on OCE is Plat on NA and you're Gold on OCE, does that mean you're Bronze in NA? Also, Junglers DON'T need to gank, for anyone, there is nothing that says Junglers are obliged to gank for laners so i don't know what you're complaining about. For a "Diamond" player you sure talk a lot, let me remind you, you are in a team that you have no idea of and you're trying to reason with them on why you're feeding? DO you think they care? They don't know you, you don't know them, why bother trying to reason with them, at the end of the day, they will forget about you, and you will forget about them, you're not bonded, you're not friends, who cares? They don't care if you're feeding and you shouldn't either, everyone has bad games but the fact that you chose to make this bad game even worse by trying to prove yourself therfore making yourself more stupid. Toxicity is a choice, and you chose it, it's not about the words you use, it's about how and when you use it. The worst part is you spent $700, trying to prove yourself to people you don't know and never will know for what? To get a little satisfaction? To show that you're not a feeder? You need to understand that people have bad games, and you are no exception. Trying to prove yourself is not the way to go. You just spent $700 trying to prove yourself, is it worth it?

Paragraphs... :)

I went from a 90% win rate to 48%.

The game was already awful before I even said anything.
90% of what, 10 games? If you actually had the skill to win 90% of games then you would not have the stats that you do. Simple

Umm you just called all australian players worse than you??? You probably had an easier time carrying on NA cause this isn't easy mode region. 

http://imgur.com/a/pMyUv

rekt

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-12-06T10:46:49.073+0000)

Still not sure how that's toxic. I said that this server wasn't as good as NA, which is true.

I would like to point out that because of the supreme population of NA you can easily rate players, because Australia (or OCE) has way less players it's natural that we have an offset rank. Because of NA the pros in NA are a lot better than our pros, but our bronze-plat could be measured as better because it is. When Austalian players play video games they are usually more invested, so it's not calling NA bad, but just because of casuals and their population we have better players at least up until plat.

Yeah, this region is way worse than NA.

Who has the terrible shitty education system again?
Oh right NA.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-12-06T22:02:35.836+0000)
>

>

> Oh right NA.

idk man. Australians aren't very smart. Look at accomplishments of other countries then look at how backwards of a country Australia is.

It's pretty easy to forget that Australia has given lots to the scientific community, but our Government each and every time sells what Australian scientists create/find to other countries.

For instance an Australian scientist came up with a patent that allows multiple elements to be analysed simultaneously in AAS, our Government claimed that it was worthless and sold it off.
Now every lab in the world has that breakthrough and Australia didn't see any of the credit or profit.

Australia produces a lot of breakthroughs in science and medicine, but you'll almost never hear about them because our Government doesn't give two shits.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-07T05:46:50.713+0000)

:^)

My brother has Bipolar disorder and Aspergers syndrome. He has no filter. He just says whatever is on his mind. He also has his 'comfort zones'. Modes of living and activities that he can do that don't make him anxious. He tends to do those activities incessantly.

If you thrive on playing LoL and on talking, and if that keeps you happy and healthy, then keep going bro.

You'll find individuals in game that disagree or don't understand. That doesn't mean you have to keep your mouth shut. That doesnt mean what you say is meritless. A lot of things my brother says are just the truth from an unconventional perspective.

Have fun on the rift.

You might have an assertive, rational personality type ---> try this test: https://www.16personalities.com/. 

Some people just won't understand your thoughts or feelings. It's ok. Just be comfortable being yourself. The cruel, childish beast that is OCE normals doesn't like you, but that's ok. Just find someone - or something - that does respect you.

Soz about the $700.00 account btw.

I guess you must be hurting quite a bit.

I pray things get better for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Neosinf,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-12-06T13:16:43.372+0000)

>

> 
> I pray things get better for you.

I'm a manic depressive autistic child who was neglected, abused, and ignored as a child. I am mentally a six-year-old child, because that's about as much as I grew. I suffer from a few sociopathic traits and I am on a few watchlists because they're afraid that I may one day snap and murder half the people I know. The only reason that I'm not in a padded room is because I'm sane and they feel like I'll off myself before I do more harm to other people.. .and you know, the fact I can't be alone in groups or I freak out and begin shaking.

As for everything else -- I have no idea what I'm going to do. This isn't the first account that I've dumped hundreds into and been banned. I was hoping that it wouldn't happen. Goes to show that my counselor has no idea what he's doing and I should stop going. :'D

And? Welcome to the club.

No one gives a shit, and the people who pretend to care are nothing more than utter %%%%s.

I've probably had it worse, but I don't want to get into a pissing contest, yet I act like a perfect example of good behavior in game.

Though admittedly that's because I take great pride and care in my possessions, so I would never do anything to damage my account just like I wouldn't my computer or whatever.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2016-12-06T22:07:14.173+0000)

I was answering his question. I didn't say that I was the only person with issues, did I?
No, but you act like you're the only one with a problem and use it as an excuse to act like a %%%%.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=00080000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-07T05:47:38.012+0000)

Like a percentage sign? I don't understand, sorry.

Yea i understand, once you get a few chat restrictions or a short ban your pretty much screwed, just a few reports after that from some butthurt players and your perma banned.And riot will just give you a copypasta response lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Donald Trumpet,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-12-06T20:46:55.122+0000)

This automated system is worse than Tribunal.

I suppose the rub is, Toxic players don't thing they are being toxic. Banned players never think they deserve the ban. I take from your post that you have had other accounts banned. Its corny but my dad always used to say, "If you don't have anything nice or constructive to say hold your tongue."
No one forces you to type mean words dude, You control your own keyboard. You are just a tiny cartoon avatar on the screen in league, not a single person is able to judge you personally until you type and give them reason too.

> [{quoted}](name=FerrousOxide,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-12-06T10:09:27.080+0000)

> No one forces you to type mean words dude, You control your own keyboard. You are just a tiny cartoon avatar on the screen in league, not a single person is able to judge you personally until you type and give them reason too.

I understand, but I have never once been told what I'm actually doing wrong. How can I fix it if I have no idea what's broken? I also don't use mean words... I don't swear or verbally abuse people... :/

i dont blame u for giving up that early, i would have felt hopeless too

but that doesnt mean u can annoy your team mates and make them feel like shit too, should have just been quiet

now if they were shit talking u there isnt much u can do if u get solo killed by yasuo-ur fault l0l

> [{quoted}](name=Rich3331,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-06T09:56:47.301+0000)

I didn't exactly give up, either. I still played and I helped out botlane and top. It's not like I just sat in the fountain. It also doesn't help that everyone in the game pretty much turned on me and I had to be defensive. I died to save our ADC and I got called a noob for it.

what do u expect 

everyone is going to try blame someone.....

gl getting unbanned but u should play rank

Wise words. :'D

tbh you were pre calm compared to most people getting wrecked by a yas lol honestly most "toxic" people would be using every profanity in the book I honestly don't see how this is a perma ban (or a ban at all). I'm rarely toxic but when I am hoo boy I'm 20x times worse then you were in this particular game but I'm yet to really see any repercussion from what I've read your not _that_ toxic :p well GL on getting ur account back anyways

> [{quoted}](name=yeah boii,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sei1bEGl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-06T09:26:33.408+0000)

I'm rarely toxic but when I am hoo boy I'm 20x times worse then you were in this particular game but I'm yet to really see any repercussion from what I've read your not _that_ toxic :p well GL on getting ur account back anyways

He two shot me at level 3. He wind-walled my entire combo and then spammed his mastery emote. Diana then left. I have spent 30 games hunting for an S for MR7 and then I verse Yasuo. I haven't sworn in 1,000 plus games, and for me that's impressive as I swear every fifth word.

The worst thing about that match is I got blamed for everything. I can't even think on how Lux could beat a Yasuo without ganks. I couldn't even farm without him dashing through the minions, throwing up a wall and doing 40% of my life as damage. I had less deaths than most of my team, despite that.

I knew a Yasuo would be the end of me. Just seeing that champion instantly tilts me.

I main Lux, you can beat a yas. Auto his wind sheild whenever it is up so top yourself wastign mana on him. Second is he dashs ae you E on yourself then run away, the E slows him he enters it detonate then follow with an auto for passive. Feitn at him. he will windwall.. 25 second cd, now you can take the fight to him.  Get clsoe to minions, most bronze yas will ham dash to get you e on youself for the slow and kite left or right to avoid his thrust. W is he tries to auto you, E him auto. Alternativly stand to close to minions just under tower, most bronze yas will nto think twice about tkaing one tower shot to "outplay you" and poke you under tower.. Snare him with q as soon as the tower pings on him.. e in front to slow his escape.. auto auto detonate auto ~"first blood."~

Quite the opposite, actually. I understand that these threads are disliked en masse, but I still would like something that answers my question. A simple 'get over it' isn't what I asked for, nor is it what I looked for.

I had my first account ban. Being in B5 is the most toxic place you can be in. 
You vs smurfs that want to act pro. You vs people that are hacking.

You always seem to have the feeder. You always seem to be hated by riot.
You learn soon enough not to make a post. People on the forums are either trolls. Hate'ers and just flat out drongo's.
Just do what I did. Make a new account. Mute everyone. Get reported for not talking to them. Be ban.
Open ticket. Have ban removed.
Hacks don't exist in league, the closest thing is scripts, which most of the time are usually bad to have as you can "dodge" skill shots only to walk into a thresh hook or something similar.

I know someone in plat that used scripts to get there. They only use scripts when playing that account.
But I am not going to much into it. Because people will think maybe I should use them.

The point of it was to show what lower elo's have to deal with. Crap that Riot allows to happen. { Either that. They are just so dumb they cannot stop it }

Why some times a perma ban is overkill. Maybe if Riot fix there elo system... People would stop cheating. Elo boosters exist only because of how broken it is. But I am going off track and I am leaving this convo.
